page.title: 11ATWORTH ON THE MOVE
page.content: TRANSPORT_ECOLOGY Transport is easy with most families being car owners.A regular bus service connects Atworth with Bath,Corsham and Melksham.Bikes are also very popular with the Wiltshire Cycleway,which rings the county,going through the village. The main A365 bisects the village and speeding is a problem,possibly the major one for the community policeman. Many footpaths cross the area and all are wellmarked but little used.There is a feeling that recently these footpaths are being walked more often as people become conscious of the countryside and rights of access.
